comments.creator: mtrinkala@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text: In the past the concurrency on the Taskcluster boxes has been generally limited to single task; as this changes we need to track it to provide proper cost and overhead totals.
comments.text: In the past the concurrency on the Taskcluster boxes has been generally limited to single task; as this changes we need to track it to provide proper cost and overhead totals.
comments.author: mtrinkala@mozilla.com

comments.raw_text: I should note that the capacity of most of the decision workers was meant to be 2, but due to bugs in ci-admin was 1 until I fixed the bug on 2020-05-22 (Bug 1640088). That also fixed the capacity of `*/misc` to be 8.
comments.text: I should note that the capacity of most of the decision workers was meant to be 2, but due to bugs in ci-admin was 1 until I fixed the bug on 2020-05-22 (Bug 1640088). That also fixed the capacity of `*/misc` to be 8.
comments.author: mozilla@hocat.ca
comments.creator: mozilla@hocat.ca
mtrinkala@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text:
The capacity is extracted from the CI configuration file:  https://hg.mozilla.org/ci/ci-configuration/file/668877d5f11bae3cb3f464351c249b2c7913cfa2/worker-pools.yml

The diffs since Nov 10, 2019 were manually iterated through and captured in taskclusteretl.workerpool_capacity and the cost data was regenerated/corrected on June 5th.  The automated daily extraction of the capacity data still needs to be automated.
